Title: Wigan Central Neighbourhood Family Hub (The Meadows)
Description: Launched on 14th October 2023, Wigan Central Family Hub is the first of seven family hub networks across the borough.  Family hubs will operate as a network of services within your neighbourhood to provide accessible and connected services and support to all families. These services…
